definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
Shanhai Pass in Hebei, at the eastern terminus of the Ming dynasty Great Wall/Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Hai3 guan1 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: If everyone keeps in line, we'll get through the Customs more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 要是大家都守制序，咱们会很快通过海关的。

sentences.english: How long will it take us to get through the customs.
sentences.chinese: 通过海关检查要多长时间。

sentences.english: Which things are duty-free when passing through the Customs?
sentences.chinese: 哪些东西通过海关时免税？

sentences.english: The customs house shall make examination on the person under custody within the legal detention period.
sentences.chinese: 海关应当在法定扣留期限内对被扣留人进行审查。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: If the Shanghai Customs determines there is infringement, can it impose any fine or penalty against the infringer?
sentences.chinese: 当发现侵权后，上海海关能否对侵权者罚款？

sentences.english: Henceforth it will be more difficult to avoid customs examination.
sentences.chinese: 从此以后，避免海关检查将会更加困难。

sentences.english: They went through our luggages at the customs.
sentences.chinese: 他们在海关检查了我们的行李。

sentences.english: The customs may publish the failure of taxpayers to pay duty.
sentences.chinese: 海关可以对纳税义务人欠缴税款的情况予以公告。

sentences.english: The exit goods for processing shall be shipped back to China within the time limit as prescribed by the customs.
sentences.chinese: 出境加工货物应当在海关规定的期限内复运进境。

sentences.english: When the man got back to his own country, the customs officers would not believe his story.
sentences.chinese: 男子回到自己的国家，海关官员们不相信他说的话。

sentences.english: To pass across the border, one must go through customs.
sentences.chinese: 若想通过边界的话，一定要过海关。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Processing Zone is a special area supervised by customhouse.
sentences.chinese: 第三条加工区是海关监管的特定区域。

sentences.english: We shall have to go through customes at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在机场办理海关手续。

sentences.english: I took you fMr Green from the Customs just now. May I know your name?
sentences.chinese: 我刚才把你错当作海关的格林先生了。请问尊姓大名？

sentences.english: Customs house's building and electronic waterfall clock also is quite new DuiJing.
sentences.chinese: 海关大楼与电子瀑布钟也是颇有新意的对景。

definition: to leave a country or region/outbound (tourism)
to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods
to smuggle/to have an illicit affair
